articles.author: David Mchugh
articles.title: Europe bans Russian diesel, other oil products over Ukraine - The Associated Press - en Español
articles.description: FRANKFURT, Germany (AP) — Europe imposed a ban Sunday on Russian diesel fuel  and other refined oil products, slashing energy dependency on Moscow and seeking to further crimp the Kremlin's fossil fuel earnings as punishment for invading Ukraine .

articles.title: How India Is Turning Russian Oil Into The West's Fuel - NDTV
articles.description: India is playing an increasingly important role in global oil markets, buying more and more cheap Russian oil and refining it into fuel for Europe and the US.
articles.content:
India's importance is expected to expand after fresh European Union sanctions (File)
